application.color

Class ColorPickerApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.color.ColorPickerApp

  • public class ColorPickerApp
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class is used for:
    • picking a Color via a pop-up window.
    • managing static methods to handle with Colors and Strings.
